mapper.select:
select
t1.UserId as userid, t1.AccountName as accountname, t1.NickName as nickname, t1.ForeighId as foreighid, t1.ForeighType as foreightype, t1.Funds as funds, t1.CreateDate as createdate, t1.Password as password, IFNULL(t2.Score,0) as score
from
ifyoudog.user t1 left join ifyoudog.rank t2 on t1.UserId = t2.UserId
order by t2.Score desc
